original_text: All Israel was listed in the genealogies recorded in the book of the kings of Israel and Judah. They were taken captive to Babylon because of their unfaithfulness.
korean_text: 온 이스라엘이 그 계보대로 계수되어 그들은 이스라엘 왕조실록에 기록되니라 유다가 범죄함으로 말미암아 바벨론으로 사로잡혀 갔더니

sentences.original_text: All Israel was listed in the genealogies
recorded in the book of the kings of Israel and Judah
sentences.korean_translation: 이스라엘과 유다 왕들의 책에 기록된 대로라

sentences.original_text: They were taken captive to Babylon
